Gnoll

9 HP, 2 Armor (light armor and shield), 12 STR, 12 DEX, 7 CHA, axe (d6/d8), 3d6s in stolen coins and trinkets

• Their stink is highly recognizable and spreads throughout their surroundings.

• 1-in-6 chance of being non-hostile. Can be bargained with but are only really interested in meat, preferably alive.

genre:

category: monsters source: itdr
